instructions:
In a saucepan, combine the water, celery, 6 tablespoons butter and onion. Bring to a boil. remove from the heat; stir in croutons. Spoon into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish; set aside.
In a large skillet, brown pork chops on both sides in oil. Arrange over the stuffing. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine the apples, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice; spoon over pork chops. Dot with the remaining butter. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), and meat juices run clear.
ingredients: 6 (3/4 inch) thick bone-in pork loin chops
title: Sunday Chops and Stuffing
